item.title: uneXpected 100 ERRORS - Compiler
item.dc:creator: @eXtrosion eXtrosion
item.description:
@eXtrosion wrote:

[quote=“panthers4713, post:4, topic:224673”]The first thing is missing a bracket at the end. And it would work better as:

		if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && playerRights >= 0) {
				Commands();
			}

Unless you’re doing other stuff that involves those player rights. But now that I think about it, playrights is always >= 0, so you need to review what you’re doing.[/quote]

I tried that and… THANK YOU very much! you’ve been a great help… I greatly appreciate your help, Is there a rep+ button or something, I’m new to these forums… You’ve saved me alot of time

Read full topic

item.title: uneXpected 100 ERRORS - Compiler
item.dc:creator: @panthers4713 panthers4713
item.description:
@panthers4713 wrote:

The first thing is missing a bracket at the end. And it would work better as:

		if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && playerRights >= 0) {
				Commands();
			}

Unless you’re doing other stuff that involves those player rights. But now that I think about it, playrights is always >= 0, so you need to review what you’re doing.

Read full topic

yes. you either forgot a “{” or an “}” somewhere in your code.

I think you forgot a } somewhere at the end of the codes you put in.

item.title: uneXpected 100 ERRORS - Compiler
item.dc:creator: @eXtrosion eXtrosion
item.description:
@eXtrosion wrote:

----------------------------------------------COMPILER ERRORS-------------------------------------------

I used to be an expert RS2 Private server coder and had a long break… then I decided to give it another try… I downloaded RichScape v2 and gave that a try… it was working fine for a day… then I add a few commands and it compiles nicely, then I add some teleport commands and a command that brings up a menu screen… then I get 100 Errors , I have this in past times and managed to fix… but this is just talkin gibberish in-which I haven’t touched

HERE ARE SCREENSHOTS

The only thing I have added since it was last working is:

if (playerRights >= 0) { if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { Commands(); }

And

[CODE] public void Commands() {
sendFrame126("@dre@All Player Commands", 8144); // Helpmenu title
clearQuestInterface();
sendFrame126("::food", 8145);
sendFrame126("::falador", 8146);
sendFrame126("::lumbridge", 8147);
sendFrame126("::varrock", 8148);
sendFrame126("", 8149);
sendFrame126("", 8150);
sendFrame126("", 8155);
sendFrame126("", 8156);
sendFrame126("", 8157);
sendFrame126("", 8158);

	sendQuestSomething(8143);
	showInterface(8134);
}[/CODE]

PLEASE HELP

-Regards, eXtrosion

Read full topic
